challenge.title: Step 93
challenge.description: For the green marker's box-shadow property, replace the named color with a hex color code. Use the values 3B for red, 7E for green, 20 for blue, and CC for the alpha channel.

tests.text: Your .green CSS rule should have a box-shadow shorthand property and with the value 0 0 20px 0 #3B7E20CC.
